hero.subtitle: Professional welding services delivering precision, quality, and durability

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Transforming metal into masterpieces through precision and passion
about.journey1: With years of experience in professional welding, I've dedicated my career to mastering the art and science of metalwork. Every project is an opportunity to showcase precision, attention to detail, and unwavering commitment to quality.
about.journey2: From structural steel work to custom fabrication, I approach each job with the same level of professionalism and expertise. My work speaks for itself through the strength and beauty of every weld.
about.journey3: I believe in building lasting relationships with my clients by delivering exceptional results that exceed expectations. Your project isn't just another job—it's a reflection of my craft and reputation.

features.title: Certified Professional
features.description: Fully certified and experienced in all welding techniques

features.title: Quality Assured
features.description: Every project meets the highest standards of quality and safety

features.title: Timely Delivery
features.description: Projects completed on schedule without compromising quality

features.title: Client Focused
features.description: Dedicated to understanding and exceeding client expectations

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore a collection of my latest welding projects and metalwork creations.
projects.noProjects: No projects found. Check back soon!

precisionMetalFabrication.title: Precision Metal Fabrication
precisionMetalFabrication.description: Expert metal fabrication with clean, precise welding work.
precisionMetalFabrication.detailedDescription: This project showcases our precision metal fabrication capabilities with clean, professional welding work. The piece demonstrates attention to detail and quality craftsmanship in metalworking.

structuralSteelWork.title: Structural Steel Work
structuralSteelWork.description: Heavy-duty structural steel welding for industrial applications.
structuralSteelWork.detailedDescription: Professional structural steel work demonstrating strong, reliable welds for industrial applications. This project highlights our ability to work with heavy materials and create durable structures.

customMetalArtPiece.title: Custom Metal Art Piece
customMetalArtPiece.description: Artistic metal creation showcasing welding artistry.
customMetalArtPiece.detailedDescription: A unique metal art piece that combines artistic vision with expert welding techniques. This custom creation demonstrates the beauty that can be achieved through skilled metalwork.

industrialMetalFramework.title: Industrial Metal Framework
industrialMetalFramework.description: Heavy-duty metal framework construction with precision welding.
industrialMetalFramework.detailedDescription: This industrial framework project showcases our ability to create strong, precise metal structures. The clean welds and solid construction demonstrate professional metalworking skills.

decorativeMetalRailing.title: Decorative Metal Railing
decorativeMetalRailing.description: Elegant metal railing with custom design elements.
decorativeMetalRailing.detailedDescription: This decorative railing combines functionality with aesthetic appeal. The custom design features clean lines and precise welding, creating a beautiful and durable addition to any space.

metalSculptureInstallation.title: Metal Sculpture Installation
metalSculptureInstallation.description: Artistic metal sculpture with intricate welding details.
metalSculptureInstallation.detailedDescription: This metal sculpture showcases the artistic potential of welding. The piece features intricate details and demonstrates how metal can be transformed into beautiful, flowing forms.

customMetalGateDesign.title: Custom Metal Gate Design
customMetalGateDesign.description: Handcrafted metal gate with unique design elements.
customMetalGateDesign.detailedDescription: This custom metal gate combines security with artistic design. The piece features clean lines and precise welding, creating a beautiful and functional entrance.

industrialMetalStructure.title: Industrial Metal Structure
industrialMetalStructure.description: Heavy-duty metal structure with professional welding.
industrialMetalStructure.detailedDescription: This industrial structure demonstrates our expertise in large-scale metal fabrication. The project features precise welding and structural integrity for industrial applications.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Let's discuss how I can help
contact.responseTime: I typically respond within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please call directly.

footer.tagline: Professional welding services delivering quality craftsmanship and precision work for all your welding needs.

introduction.title: Professional Welding Excellence
introduction.description: With years of experience and dedication to quality, I deliver superior welding solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. Every weld is crafted with precision and built to last.
